hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
rapport my name is Dave and this is
episode
1519 a and today's date is March 12th
2018 and the title of the episode is why
are the central bank officials screaming
and yelling let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now we are
starting to see that governments are
taking crypto currencies very very
seriously
and they're pushing forth regulations
now some regulations are good some are
bad and the latest regulation and this
is coming from a federal judge on
cryptocurrencies
which he ruled saying that those
manipulating cryptocurrencies can now go
to jail now we need to think about this
first second and we know that the
central banking system has the ability
to manipulate we also know the
individual out in Japan has been dumping
a lot of Bitcoin which when you dump
that amount and you sell it off it
lowers the price and the central banks
they can do the same exact thing where
they can use their fiat currency they
can create as much as they want buy up
Bitcoin and then dump it to make it look
like Bitcoin is volatile or do this to
any cryptocurrency to make it look like
the cryptocurrency market is very
volatile and we can see a judge was out
there and he made a ruling US District
Judge Jack Weinstein for the Eastern
District of New York ruled that
cryptocurrencies are indeed commodities
under the Commodity Exchange Act and
therefore subject to the CFTC's anti
fraud an anti manipulation enforcement
authority this allowed the case to go
forward and this also could be applied
to those banks that are controlled by
the or or I should say intertwine with
the central bank where they're trying to
maybe manipulate the crypto market now
we understand they don't like the crypto
market they see that this
a threat to their business and if it
does become some type of currency and we
know there are certain states already
saying that you can use cryptocurrency
Bitcoin I should say to pay for taxes we
know that businesses are looking at
cryptocurrencies to allow people to
purchase their goods using this and
eventually what's going to happen as
employers are gonna say hey why don't we
just pay people in cryptocurrency now
again the central banks don't want
people to use the crypto market because
then you wouldn't be using their finance
system and they don't want this to
happen they want everyone to use the
Federal Reserve Note but as we know the
central banking system I think at this
point is doomed they're under threat why
do I say this well Trump put forth his
tariff plant now there are many
countries out there that are screaming
and yelling and China already said
listen we're not gonna start a trade war
that's not what we're going to do we'll
have to wait and see but this is what
they're saying the central banks on the
other hand the ECB the IMF the Fed
they're all out there and the corporate
media included saying tariffs are the
worst thing ever we should not do this
this is going to hurt the global economy
this is not good for our system what
they're saying it's not good for their
system and we see right now the central
banks they are very nervous and afraid
that their system will be taking down
eventually they know and they see the
writing is on the wall the Federal
Reserve Bank of Atlanta president
Raphael Bostic said steel and aluminum
terraces bring uncertainty that could
hurt the economy's robust growth
Christine Lagarde was out there saying
these tariffs will not help the global
economy European trade commissioner has
promised that Europe would fight back
against those who intimidate its trade
eels I mean think about what they're
saying right now think about who's
systemness is this is not the people
system and we need to remember something
very very important here the central
bank was removed from the United States
by Andrew Jackson this was back in 1836
he abolished the Bank of the United
States that's what it was called back
then arguing that it exerted undue and
unhealthy influence over the course of
the national of the national economy
from then until 1913 the United States
didn't allow the formation of a private
central bank during that period of
nearly three-quarters of a century
monetary policies were carried out more
or less according to the US Constitution
only the Congress shall have the power
to coin money regulate the value thereof
article one section eight US
Constitution not long before the
establishment of the Federal Reserve
Bank in 1913 President William Taft
pledged to veto any legislation that
included the formation of a private
central bank this was between 1909 and
soon after Woodrow Wilson replaced
William Taft as president the Federal
Reserve Bank was founded in December 23
1913 thereby centralizing the power of
the US banks into a privately-owned
entity that controlled interest rate
money supply credit creation inflation
and in a roundabout way employment which
they really can control it could also
lend money to the government and earn
interest or a fee money that the
government could create free of charge
this assured in the beginning of the
gradual rise of national debt as the
government henceforth relied more on
borrowing from banks than self financing
as it had done prior to granting the
power of money creation to the private
banking system three years
after signing the Federal Reserve Act
into law Wilson said the following I am
most
unhappy man I have unwittingly ruined my
country a great industrial nation is
controlled by its system of credit our
system of credit is concentrated the
growth of Ana nation therefore and all
our activities are in the hands of a few
men we have come to be one of the worst
ruled one of the most completely
controlled and dominated governments in
the civilized world no longer a
government by free opinion no longer a
government by conviction and the vote of
the majority but a government by the
opinion and duress of a small group of
dominant men and this is what we have
today but it's much much worse he
started a chain reaction and the
situation has gotten dire and we have to
go back I mean Henry Ford said the
following it is well enough that people
the nation do not understand our banking
and monetary system for if they did I
believe there'd be a revolution before
tomorrow morning and Rothschild who are
the main owners of the central bank said
the following and give me control of a
nation's money supply and I care not who
makes its laws because they understand
once you have the ability to create
currency and governments borrow this
currency with interest attached you
control them doesn't matter what law
they put into place it makes no
difference because you hold the debt
over their head there's no law that they
can pass except one where they remove
the central bank but then again the
central bank would ask for all that
money back here you owe us
you know this trillions of dollars you
need to pay that back right now and this
is why most governments will not enact
that law so they're really not worried
about that and we could see from cue we
can see by Andrew Jackson which is
hanging on the wall of president Trump's
office that the move is to get
rid of the central bank to take it down
and this is the only way to cut off the
supply of currency to a corrupt system
if the central bank stays in power the
deep state will never disappear yes we
can bring those to trial maybe some of
them will run maybe some will suicide
themselves makes no difference what will
happen is the system will become corrupt
once again and the only way to stop this
whole thing is to reset the system now
Trump put forth these tariffs now this
is just one stage of it basically what

governments the central banks to make

take control of the narrative while

make it look like it is the central bank
and they're going to do this and we
could see the process is already in
motion
this is why Rand Paul is introducing
audit the Fed because all of this is
going to hit it once and you and I don't
this is not going to be six years from
now eight years from now this is going
to happen within a couple of months to a
year I don't think it's gonna go much
longer than that because time is ticking
down and something has to be done before
the four years are up and I'm talking
about Trump's four years because if he
lets this go even further
he has lost control completely so we see
right now that they are making their
move now
need to start the process they need to
break it down they need to do all of
this now because if they don't they will
not gain control of the economic system
and then the deep state if they just get
rid of the deep state and the central
bank still lives on nothing has been

whatever happens but the whole system
will still be intact the whole thing
will be repeated once again and this is
what we're seeing and this is what we're
watching being played out and this is
why the central banks the IMF the Fed
the ECB and the rest this is why they're
very worried about these tariffs this is
why they don't want this to happen and
you're gonna see they're going to make a
move which is going to try to counter

trapping them because he needs to turn

gonna have to build a case and this is
what's going to be done now what has to

the audit bill has to go through it has

have to go in they have to investigate
and pull their records now of course
once the auto bill goes through you
think the feds just gonna say hey come

things happen during this period of time
this is why he needs to maneuver and
take the narrative and control the
narrative and make sure that everyone is
pointing the finger at the central bank
this is the move he is playing right now
will it succeed I hope so
because this is what he's pushing for
because if it doesn't succeed yes
what we're back to where we were we have
the central bank the deep States going
to absolutely nowhere and the economic
system guess what it will be transferred

they will control it there will still be
under the Fiat system cryptocurrencies
will be pushed aside the economy will

and the whole thing will be reset the

because what's happening now is
everything is coming in around the deep

and this is what we're going to see

not going to know what to do but no

now into a new system and they'll try to

but once again no matter what you have

listen everyone thanks a lot for
